Gesels Anonymous Chat

Chat with Random people

A well secured anonymous chat platform. No login required and this app will not store any kind of user information. All the user messages will be deleted as soon as he/ she left the chat.

App Store Google Play


Developed by Dhahas Technologies for a better and secured anonymous chat platform which is totaly free. Dhahas Technologies is a software start up intended to deliver any kind of custom software development services.
